title: My father wants me to go to a mixed gathering, what to do? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: his father wants him to go with him to a mixed gathering you should not go my father is stubborn i know my father works for the military may allah make it easy for you try your level best to not go if you're forced and there is real genuine harm on you if you don't go you can go and stay in the car or leave early or whatever insha allah
